nodes.text: The Utheel Rockcrusher Compact Seismic Charge was an explosive charge manufactured by Utheel Outfitters of Rodia during the Imperial Era. Following the Battle of Yavin, Luke Skywalker used an Utheel Rockcrusher Compact Seismic Charge to destroy an Immobilizer 418 cruiser in the Daalang system during a mission to rescue the Givin cryptologist Drusil Bephorin.
